The library used in this demo is available on Github. It was written by Jerome DAVID, an Android developer from UNCOPT LLC. 
UNCOPT LLC is a small company based in Houston, TX and was funded in 2011 by two developers: Jerome DAVID and Christophe CASADEBAIG. It specializes in Android development. 
The first app published by UNCOPT was Duo: Holo File Manager w/ Root (DuoFM). It's a file manager that focuses on security, but also on performance and ease of use. You can read more about it here. Plugins for this file manager are available (for free) and are distributed as separate applications. 
The second app published was a small developer tools called Character Codes. It's an app that conveniently displays character codes and entity name. 
« DuoFM » is available for free (with ads) and as a paid version, while « Character Codes » is only available as a paid app. Since the release of those two apps, new UNCOPT apps have been released completely free with no ads or tracking of any kind. Instead, there's a Donation app and users can show their appreciation and help out by donating a little bit of money.
